name: Meltdown (itch) (Louie Jams)
description:
Entry for Ludum Dare 49 - Unstable.

The reactor is unstable! Don't let the temperature get too hot or too cold. Repair the cracks so they don't leak! Turn the valve to release waste!

~Controls~

Left and right arrow keys to move.

Up and down arrow keys for elevator.

Space to Jump

"Z" to use buttons and fix cracks.

Press "R" to restart when game over appears.
